name: Violet-Eyes Ultimate Dragon
text:
"Violet-Eyes Grey Dragon" + "Violet-Eyes Grey Dragon" + "Violet-Eyes Grey Dragon"
At the end of the Damage Step: You can send 1 "Blue-Eyes" or "Red-Eyes" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck to the GY; this card can attack again in a row. You can use this effect of "Violet-Eyes Ultimate Dragon" twice per turn. When a card or effect is activated that targets a "Blue-Eyes", "Red-Eyes", or "Violet-Eyes" monster(s) you control (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your GY; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card.
